name: .SCUT5
summary: Learn about .SCUT5 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a SCUT5 with Craft Edge Sure Cuts A Lot (version 5 or later). For example, to open a SCUT5 file with version 5 of Sure Cuts A Lot, select File → Open Project.
Craft Edge Easy Cut Studio (version 5 or later) can also open SCUT5 files. To open a SCUT5 file with Easy Cut Studio 5, select File → Import.
Sure Cuts A Lot can convert SCUT5 files to various file types, including the following formats:

images.alt: Screenshot of a .scut5 file in Craft Edge Easy Cut Studio 5
